title: ‘Terrifying Warning’ About Ice Cream Trucks and Chloroform
subtitle: A viral social media post claimed that young girls were being drugged with chloroform by ice cream trucks, but the rumor appeared to be baseless.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Mothers of girls should be on the lookout for ice cream trucks (specifically Mr. Softee branded ones) as reports of chloroform kidnappings have surfaced.
